about.title: About Nini
about.bio:
Welcome to my personal universe—a calm, inspiring space where beauty meets meaning and authenticity. I'm Nini, a Georgian visual storyteller, content creator, and educator passionate about sharing the art of thoughtful creation.

My work brings together creativity, professional experience, and inspiration through visual education, authentic storytelling, and aesthetic exploration. From masterclasses in visual strategy to sharing my creative journey, I create with intention—celebrating Georgian heritage while embracing contemporary vision.
about.mission: I believe beauty and emotion live in every detail. My mission is to inspire you to follow your own creative path with grace, warmth, and authenticity.
